item.description:
When possible, from 7:30-9:30pm, about 20-40 liberty activists meet up at La Festa's, at the northernmost end of Route 108. This event has had consistently good turnout, and you can see us with the tables bunched up together in the side room on the right.

If you're looking for large numbers of liberty activists, this is the largest get together on the seacoast, at the moment.

group.name: Essex County Libertarian Politics & Activism Meetup Group

item.name: Weekly Libertarian meetup at La Festa's
